ingredientsDesc: CD19 (4G7): the CD19 antibody is composed of mouse IgG1 heavy chains and kappa light chains. The monoclonal antibody is supplied as 50 μg purified immunoglobulin in 2.0 ml (25 μg/ml) of phosphate-buffered saline (PBS). The FITC conjugate is supplied as 50 μg in 2.0 ml (25 μg/ml) of PBS. PBS contains gelatin and 0.1% sodium azide. \nAnti-Kappa/Anti-Lambda: anti-Kappa and anti-Lambda are each composed of mouse IgG1 heavy chains and kappa light chains. The Simultest reagent is supplied as a combination of anti-kappa FITC and anti-lambda PE in 1.0 ml of phosphate-buffered saline (PBS). Twenty microliters (20 μl) of the conjugated antibody stain 106 peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCS). PBS contains gelatin and 0.1% sodium azide.\nLambda F(ab’)2/CD19: CD19 is composed of mouse IgG1 heavy chains and kappa light chains. The Simultest reagent is supplied as a combination of Lambda F(ab’)2 FITC and CD19 PE in 1.0 ml of phosphate-buffered saline (PBS). Twenty microliters (20 μl) of the conjugated antibody stain 1
